title: Question
author: JGray
text:
I ask but one question...

What's your favorite page of Mysteries of the Arcana? I'm curious!

replies.author: Forewarned76*Guest*
replies.text: OMG, it's the son of Norm, the mechanical man, someone call Perry the Platapus

replies.author: Fox of the Bleeding Tree*Guest*
replies.text: Three words: Lesbian. Elf. Kisses. (True Loves First Kiss) That page was adorable. From the look on Theresia's face when she gets kissed, to the "Wait! I need pants!" chibi comic, this is the page that has always stuck out to me the most to me.

replies.author: thelonecarrot*Guest*
replies.text: The first page showing the horrors. The idea of creatures wearing the facade of a sterotyped 1950's style Nueclear Family with the whole 'perfect suburbia' feel to how they talk and act has so much uncanny and grotesque potential that I love it. And so far your delivering on everything.

replies.author: PharmaDan*Guest*
replies.text: pretty much any romantic moment with Theresa and Chrys.

replies.author: weertangel*Guest*
replies.text: True love first kiss 3rded(or whatever u call it)I really love that one, it just exacly how i would have done it as for 2nd, i would take the one  on witch the big island turtle shows his face, it really gives a vibe like "wtf is that??!! and it really shines from Theresa!

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
I think my favorite page is !GNAB. It�s definitely in my top 5.
It�s Williams crowning moment of awesome.
